price: Sε esiane ba wͻn fie adihͻ a, εbεyε anͻpa bͻne ama wͻn a yɛabͻ wͻn kͻkͻ no.
arabic: فَإِذَا نَزَلَ بِسَاحَتِهِمۡ فَسَآءَ صَبَاحُ ٱلۡمُنذَرِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā nazala bisāḥatihim fasāa ṣabāḥu al-mundharīna
